situation: During science fair presentation day, L was unable to speak in front of the class due to anxiety, becoming visibly upset when his turn came.
action: The teacher aide discreetly approached L, encouraging him to take deep breaths and offering to stand by him while he presented his project. L was also given the option to present in a quieter setting with fewer peers.
effect: With this support, L managed to give his presentation to a smaller group, which boosted his confidence and reduced his anxiety significantly.
